name: 3D Tank War: Last Battle
description:
The most wonderful world tank war game of 2016! ! !
The rivalry forces have invaded your country with the military tanks and naval ships!
Your country needs you to defeat all enemies.
As the Tank Hero,get to the battlefield for fighting!!
Control the tank through the enemy territory,shoot soldiers，destroy all enemy vehicles and naval ships.
Repair or upgrade your tank to destroy them before they can harm you.

Complete all missions to win this war.Much fun！
